links.title: Tencent (TCEHY) buys a 5% stake in Tesla (TSLA)
links.description: Tesla (TSLA) was up $7 today on the news that Tencent (TCEHY) bought a 5% stake in Elon Musk's car company. Tencent bought 8.2 million shares of Tesla's shares on the open market for 1.8 billion dollars. Tencent already has investments in AI (artificial intelligence) and self-driving cars.

links.description: Stocks were indicated marginally higher on Monday, but not with enough of a gain to create any serious expectations for the day. While this bull market in stocks is now more than eight years old, investors have shown for more than five years that they are willing to buy every market pullback.
